de.adesso.termacare.database.construct

Class GenericRepo<T extends EntityInterface,ID extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.adesso.termacare.database.construct.GenericRepo<T,ID>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of class to use this repository for
    ID - type of id the entity has
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repo<T,ID>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddressRepo, DoctorRepo, MedicationRepo, PatientRepo

    public class GenericRepo<T extends EntityInterface,ID extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Repo<T,ID>
    Generic database repository used for listing, saving, loading and deleteing of any entity that implements the marker interface EntityInterface
